name: <WebDevSim/>
description:
How I start on building my own Website?

Making your own website without any knowledge can be pretty overwhelming.

You are confronted with HTML, CSS and Javascript. But theses are only the basics for web design. And even then all three of these can overwhelm you. So what do I need you ask? WebDevSim should get you the answer.

is teaching you the basics on all three things mentioned above. You will write in HTML.  See what you can make with CSS and with Javascript code some interactions.

Playing will give you the knowledge to start and build your own website.
